channel.title: Reproducible Builds Talk
channel.description:
Lunar from TPO discussed the progress made on Debian's reproducible builds here:
https://media.ccc.de/browse/conferences/camp2015/camp2015-6657-how_to_make_your_software_build_reproducibly.html
For the latest information on best practices for making reproducible packages see [b]Make a package reproducible[/b]
https://wiki.debian.org/ReproducibleBuilds
